Articles.Content: I have been through about 15 f5 keys. Any got spares?
OMG. We've achieved perpetual hypemotion.
I can't see anything out the train windows! We are in a warp bubble!
I really wonder if it will even release at noon Mexico time. I really wish it would but don't know really. But HYPE is real.

The fasten seat belts sign is on...

\*SMASHES SIGN WITH HAMMER\*

THE HYPE IS TOO MUCH

> 
> We've gone trans-plaid again.
> Happy landings!

Landing? What landing? Velocity HYPE >>>>>>>>> Kerbol/galaxy/kluster/kerbiverse ESCAPE SPEED!!!!!
t -4 mins in england!
Thank god KSP uses steam these days, I don't want to imagine how this launch would have melted squad's servers.
3 minutes, the store isn't working yet!
Kerbalx countdown page showed 21 minutes, then I refreshed and it broke.
wait no, t-3 mins
Ohhhhhhh boy I can smell the coal burning from here!

> 
> I have been through about 15 f5 keys. Any got spares?

I shall sacrifice mine...

Wait, haven't you melted?

> 
> I wonder if we will break 9000 posts before the release.

due to hype-dilation, we're actually already past that. Servers just haven't caught up yet..

4 minutes until it's released possibly, another 2 hours before it finishes downloading assuming the servers don't explode ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
The dev team is just like,"its ready should we release it, nah let them suffer."

THREE MINUTES

so 

much 

hype
15 more pages to 555

> 
> The only way for this train to move faster is for you to give up your physical form and fully embrace the hype.
> Join my in the Hypeforce.

Can't.. I have gases today...
I reload, and there's not one, but two new pages.
incoming steam update any time now
1 minute if its released noon mexico time.

C'mon Squad! I ***can't wait any more!*** ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)***;.;***![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

Screw the boosters, Warp drive engaged.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HuDzWswfDnE?start=171&feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
